Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is worth more than $120 to me, but I understand that its true value may be different to you. To make this opportunity appealing, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that set this product apart. I believe it represents a great value for you and an excellent opportunity to experience something truly special. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
